author: Phil Vickery
method: Dip the tuna steak in the egg white and then coat in sesame seeds. Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan and fry the tuna for 2-3 minutes on each side, or to personal taste. For the relish, place the fresh mint and coriander in a bowl. Add the oil, caster sugar, lime juice, pineapple and salt and freshly ground black pepper. Toss together to coat. To serve, transfer the crusted tuna to a serving plate and spoon the relish alongside.
ingredients: ½ tuna steak,  1 free-range egg white,  4 tbsp sesame seeds,  drizzle oil,  handful fresh mint,  handful fresh coriander ,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tsp caster sugar,  1 lime, juice only,  ½ pineapple, peeled and chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
